blog.name: proudmarveltrash2k19
blog.title: Amanda la Malanga
blog.description: I've been on this website for 10 years and I'm too grown for this. Fangirling is really the only way of life I know. I'm a Slytherin and a Horned Serpent, and yes my patronus is a chow dog... I'm a VERY scary person. I am also proud Marvel trash. Multifandom. Film geek. Psych major (if that even matters tbh). Raised in america, born in cuba. 21. Just want a nap tbh.(request- open)

summary: Except the star was still a teenage Spider-Man, the film wasn't about adult Peter, but Teen Miles.
question: Except the star was still a teenage Spider-Man, the film wasn't about adult Peter, but Teen Miles.
answer:
You didn’t read my post at all and took something from it that wasn’t even there. I never said Peter was the main character. And guess what? They’re are multiple Spider-Mans in the film and two of them happen to be PETER PARKER. In the post i mention Peter by name. Not the Spider-Man name.

Yeah I am well aware buddy that Miles was the lead, given it was his origin story. All I was trying to say was we haven’t really been able to see Peter Parker in his full adulthood in which he is done with everyone’s shit before and no Toby’ s was too campy to count so. I never said Peter was the star of Spider-Verse. I just said that when I read Earth-616 Spider-Man, I prefer him older and not a teen because I feel like we recycle the same stuff when he is a teen.

That’s all, I never took any credit anyway from Miles Morales at all and given that I am a latina i would never disregard him since he represents me and many others. I was just trying to make a point about Peter Parker, you know who isn’t Miles Morales.

👆this is the orginal post btw. I’m sorry my opinion made you so butt hurt

title: Spider Verse and AquaMan
body:
Spider Verse and AquaMan

I saw 2 movies 2 nights in a row.

A sneak peak of AQUAMAN last night and “Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse” tonight.

Aquaman- eye candy for the ladies.  A superhero who doesnt need a rubber muscle suit.

 

View On WordPress

blog.name: chucksnerdthoughts
blog.title: Chuck's Nerd Thoughts
blog.description: A place for all my nerdy thoughts.

title: Miles Morales: Spider-Man #1
body:
I did not realize that Judge wasn’t a brand new character. I had zero memory of him and had to look him up. He was his roommate before Goldballs. I guess when he randomly left, Judge came back? I could be mixing this all up, but I think that’s what happened. Regardless, i don’t remember Miles ever really being friends with Judge. I vaguely remember Judge not liking him and annoyingly telling Miles that he knows he’s Spider-Man so he can stop tiptoeing. Whatever though. This issue was solid. It was a lot of recap, but I didn’t mind. With the new movie, I’m sure this will get a ton of new readers. I really loved Rhino’s reluctance to fight. It gave his character some nice dimension. This should be interesting going forward. I am optimistic! Personally, I’d love it if they’d bring back Ultimate Jessica Drew and Kitty Pryde, but I won’t hold my breath.

-Chuck
